ComicInfo.Summary: Polychrome has arrived to save the Emerald City from all who threaten to harm it, and many of its citizens already worship this glorious and powerful deity. But Dorothy Gale has a feeling that Polychrome's promises of peace and resurrection are too good to be true. But can she do anything to stop the Goddess from taking control?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-20 10:11:29. [CVDB1055641]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Cocoaspen, Ivan Nunes, Nei Ruffino, Robby Bevard, Urszula Mos
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Al Barrionuevo, Cocoaspen, Drax Gal, Ian McDonald, Igor Vitorino, Ivan Nunes, Nei Ruffino, Paul Green, Sonia Matas, Sun Khamunaki, Urszula Mos
